locations.name: Tyler's Bedroom
locations.description: Typical American teenage boy's bedroom. Twin bed with navy blue comforter, walls covered with posters (sports teams, video games, bands). Desk with laptop, scattered homework, gaming headset. Messy but not filthyâ€”clothes on floor, overflowing laundry basket. Basketball in corner. Tan carpet, window with blinds.
key_features: twin bed with navy blue comforter
walls with posters (Ohio State Buckeyes, video games, bands)
desk with laptop and homework papers

lighting_conditions.early_morning: dark room, only phone screen glowing
lighting_conditions.evening: desk lamp illumination, window showing dark sky

locations.prompt_template: anime illustration, masterpiece, teenage boy's bedroom, twin bed with navy blue comforter, walls covered with sports and video game posters, desk with laptop, messy floor with clothes, laundry basket, basketball in corner, tan carpet, typical American teen room, detailed interior
locations.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, clean organized room, adult bedroom, childish room, japanese style bedroom

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Maintain typical teen room messy-but-livable atmosphere

locations.name: Family Bathroom
locations.description: Standard American family bathroom shared by siblings. White tile floor, single vanity with sink, large mirror, toilet, bathtub with striped shower curtain. Two toothbrush holders (Tyler's blue, Emma's pink). Towels on bar. Clean but used. Typical suburban house bathroom.

lighting_conditions.evening: same bright light for nighttime routine

locations.prompt_template: anime illustration, masterpiece, family bathroom, white tile floor, single vanity sink, large mirror, toilet, bathtub with striped shower curtain, two toothbrushes in holders (blue and pink), towels on bar, typical American suburban bathroom, bright lighting, detailed interior
locations.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, dirty bathroom, luxury bathroom, double vanity, modern minimalist

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Maintain typical family bathroom feel, shared by siblings

locations.name: Family Kitchen
locations.description: Modest American family kitchen with dining area. White cabinets, laminate counters, window over sink showing backyard. Round kitchen table with four chairs. Standard appliances: refrigerator, stove, microwave, coffee maker. Functional and clean but not fancy. Small-town family home kitchen.
key_features: round kitchen table with four chairs
family message board or calendar on wall

lighting_conditions.morning: bright natural light through window, overhead light on
lighting_conditions.evening: overhead kitchen light, darker outside window

locations.prompt_template: anime illustration, masterpiece, modest American family kitchen, white cabinets, laminate counters, window over sink, round kitchen table with four chairs, refrigerator, stove, microwave, coffee maker, fake flower centerpiece, typical suburban home kitchen, warm family atmosphere, detailed interior
locations.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, luxury kitchen, modern designer kitchen, granite counters, stainless steel everything, restaurant kitchen

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Maintain modest family kitchen feel, not fancy but comfortable

generation_settings.model: Animagine XL 3.1 or equivalent anime SDXL model
generation_settings.notes: Generate 3 reference images per location with slight angle variations

usage_instructions.step_1: Generate location reference images using prompts above
usage_instructions.step_2: Review and select best images for each location
usage_instructions.step_4: Use selected references with IP-Adapter during scene generation
usage_instructions.step_5: Maintain consistency by using same references for all scenes in that location

notes.rationale: Faster iteration, focus on typical American teen home aesthetic
notes.cultural_elements: Small-town Ohio, modest middle-class home, family-oriented
notes.character_home_style: Middle-class suburban, functional, comfortable but not luxurious
